Hello World - Starting My Technical Journey

January 01, 2026

Welcome to My Blog!

After years of building web applications and microservices at scale, I’m embarking on an exciting transition into quantitative finance. This blog will document my journey and share technical insights along the way.

What You Can Expect

Technical Deep-Dives

  • C++ optimization techniques for high-frequency trading
  • System architecture for low-latency applications
  • Performance profiling and memory optimization
  • SIMD operations and cache-friendly algorithms

Career Insights

  • Transitioning from web development to quantitative finance
  • Building mathematical foundations for trading roles
  • Interview preparation for elite trading firms
  • Comparing different pathways into the industry

Practical Projects

  • Building a cryptocurrency matching engine
  • Implementing algorithmic trading strategies
  • Exploring FPGA programming for ultra-low latency
  • Database optimization for financial data

My Background

Currently a Senior Software Engineer at Hoppa Group, where I’ve worked on:

  • Node.js microservices serving 500,000+ users
  • PostgreSQL optimization and scaling strategies
  • Elasticsearch implementation and performance tuning
  • DevOps and infrastructure automation

With a mathematics degree and strong systems programming interests, I’m now focusing on the intersection of technology and financial markets.

What’s Next?

Stay tuned for posts covering everything from C++ template metaprogramming to market microstructure analysis. Whether you’re interested in high-performance computing, financial technology, or career transitions, there should be something here for you.

Let’s build something amazing together!

Follow me on GitHub for code examples and projects.
